ABOUT.TITLE: WHAT AM I LOOKING AT?
ABOUT.P1: I KNOW IT'S CHEESY, BUT I REALLY WANT TO THANK YOU, MIKIO, FOR BEING MY TEACHER, MENTOR, AND FRIEND. WHEN YOU COME ON THIS SITE, IT WILL SHOW YOU A SUNSET THAT'S HAPPENING SOMEWHERE IN THE WORLD. NOW YOUR FAVORITE TIME OF THE DAY IS ALL DAY. HOPE YOU ENJOY.
